Based on his research, he found that the Vikings from both Norway and Sweden embarked on several maritime expeditions together, revealing the profound connections between these two nations. Their conversation shifted towards the East when Lars shared his fascination with the historical links between China and Japan.

Keen to share this, she contacted her friend Lars, a fellow historian from Sweden, who had also been studying the ties between Norway and Sweden for years. Based on his research, he found that the Vikings from both Norway and Sweden embarked on several maritime expeditions together, revealing the profound connections between these two nations. Their conversation shifted towards the East when Lars shared his fascination with the historical links between China and Japan.
